title: Rainmaker

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Guilt Trip- (Night) Target a player. You will see who they are visiting, and may choose to roleblock them.
Storm Cell!- (Night) [Cheat] When used, you see all attacks that occurred during the night (the perpetrators and targets). You may choose up to two to delay to the next night. The delayed attacks will fail tonight, but they will occur Astrally and 1 tier stronger the next night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Innocent (Passive)- At the beginning of the game, you may choose a disguise role. You will appear as that role to any investigations that do not pierce detection immunity.
-If an attack is failed by Storm Cell!, the visit still occurs. The attacker is told their attack failed, but the defender is not informed of anything.
-The same attack cannot be delayed twice by Storm Cell!

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Pave the way for a C.O.G.S takeover of the Town! (Normal REF goal)
